title: vCenter Integration Node
description: Specify configuration for Nuage MetroAE VCINs.

mgmt_ip.title: Management IP address
mgmt_ip.description: IP address of the management port for the VCIN instance

mgmt_ip_prefix.title: Management IP prefix length
mgmt_ip_prefix.description: IP prefix length for the management network of the VCIN instance

mgmt_gateway.title: Management IP gateway
mgmt_gateway.description: IP address of the gateway for the management network of the VCIN instance

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the VCIN VM on the hypervisor/vcenter

target_server_type.title: Target Server type
target_server_type.description: Type of environment into which the VCIN will be instantiated

target_server.title: Target Server hostname
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor or vCenter server where the VCIN will be instantiated

master_vcin.title: Master VCIN hostname
master_vcin.description: The FQDN or IP address of the Master VCIN in an Active/Standby deployment. Only used when this VCIN is part of an active/standby configuration. The hostname provided here must match the hostname of another VCIN in the list of VCINs for this deployment.

vcenter_datacenter.title: vCenter Datacenter
vcenter_datacenter.description: vCenter datacenter, only applicable for vcenter server type and defaults to global settings

vcenter_cluster.title: vCenter Cluster
vcenter_cluster.description: vCenter cluster, only applicable for vcenter server type and defaults to global settings

vcenter_datastore.title: vCenter Datastore
vcenter_datastore.description: vCenter datastore, only applicable for vcenter server type and defaults to global settings
